Name: Bob The Cube
About the game: Bob The Cube is a 3D platformer game. Bob The Cube is the main character of the game. Bob's girlfriend was kidnapped and you have to complete all the levels to rescue her. You have to go through 15 unique 3D and 2.5D levels in 5 different worlds. In each level you can challenge yourself to complete the level in time or to explore and complete the level 100%. Features: - Awesome music - 5 Different bosses - 15 Unique levels - 31 Achievements The game is simple and fun to play Controls: - 'WASD' or 'Arrow' keys to move - 'Q' and 'E' to rotate camera - 'Space' or 'J' to jump - 'L' to attack - 'K' to grab/throw and push objects Game is perfect for speedrunners Steam Leaderboards in the future! Trading cards are created and can be activated in the future
